snippet.title: HYPERDRIVE MASSACRE - LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
Find Hyperdrive Massacre on Steam!
https://bit.ly/3v8Tx99

Hyperdrive Massacre is an 80s inspired arcade fragfest in Spacewar sauce designed around local multiplayer, focused on kinestetics, tactical and shooting skills at a frenzied pace.

Coming the 12th October 2015 on Steam!

CHECK OUT OUR NEWEST GAME, GOAT OF DUTY, ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/555000/Goat_of_Duty/

** Please note: controllers required! **

CHECK OUT OUR GAMES ON STEAM!

Redout: Enhanced Edition: 
https://bit.ly/3x0bybh

Goat of Duty
https://bit.ly/3glY2ZP

Redout: Space Assault
https://bit.ly/3e0SDnS

Helheim
https://bit.ly/3gkLbH5

Mars or Die!
https://bit.ly/3uTmfum

Super Inefficient Golf
https://bit.ly/3afGryJ

Hyperdrive Massacre
https://bit.ly/3v8Tx99
